page.title: 18GALA DAY AT ST.NINIANS
page.content: The first gala was held in{Thistle {Park.}Its gala queen was Margaret McKenzie. The people who started the gala were Mr and Mrs Walker. This years gala queen is{Elaine Dow. Her dress, which will cost about Â£30,will be made for her by Mrs Kemp. The parade starts at Cultenhove Community Centre and ends at Mayfield. Lots of clubs such as Pipe Bands, Highland Dancing and Majorettes go to the gala. The gala queens float isn't always the best as last year the majorettes won. The gala is completely free apart from crisps, juice and ice-cream. Last year there were about 550 people at the gala. There is a competition for the best float and the winner gets a trophy. The gala is from 11 in the morning until 4 in the afternoon. (N.HAMMOND,W.BROWN,F.REID.)
